question: Which Union Ministry implements Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT)?
option2: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
Union Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs implements the Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT).
The scheme aims to provide basic infrastructure for water supply, sewage and seepage management in 500 Mission cities. Recently, the scheme was in news because the states across India have completed 2,854 projects worth â‚¹11,110 crore under the scheme. Tamil Nadu completed the highest number of works.
